sections.heading: Release not to affect right to damagesThe release of property upon furnishing security under Articles 3507, 3509, or 3576 shall not preclude a party from asserting the invalidity of the seizure, or impair his right to damages because of a wrongful seizure
sections.text: Release not to affect right to damagesThe release of property upon furnishing security under Articles 3507, 3509, or 3576 shall not preclude a party from asserting the invalidity of the seizure, or impair his right to damages because of a wrongful seizure.
